```lisp
[
  (:action obtain ; Obtain an item and update its state
    :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (at ?item ?location) (for_sale ?item))
    :effect (and (inventory ?agent ?item) (not (at ?item ?location)))
  ),
  (:action kneel ; Assume a kneeling position in a specified location
    :parameters (?p - person ?loc - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (not (kneeling ?p)))
    :effect (kneeling ?p)
  ),
  (:action rub_and_wash ; Rub and wash an item on a linoleum floor
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?linoleum - place)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?p ?linoleum)
        (or (and (kneeling ?p) (inventory ?p ?item) (stained ?linoleum))
            (and (clean ?linoleum) (not (wet ?linoleum))))
    )
    :effect (and
        (or (and (clean ?linoleum) (not (stained ?linoleum))))
    )
  )
]
```
